New Sentence: She is very excited to see you.

New Sentence: He has exciting memories of a happy childhood.

New Sentence: He is the funniest comedian in Uganda.

New Sentence: He died of stomach ulcers.

New Sentence: He was the best mathematics student in the whole country.

New Sentence: He is interested in eating bread.

New Sentence: He has organized to celebrate his sixteenth birthday party tonight.

Swahili - Translation: Amepanga kusherehekea kumbukizi yake ya miaka kumi na sita ya kuzaliwa usiku wa leo.

New Sentence: Your mother is a happy woman.

New Sentence: Thank you for helping me with your umbrella.

New Sentence: Most children enjoy watching animations.

New Sentence: She missed her school bus.

Swahili - Translation: Alilikosa basi lake la shule.

New Sentence: He proposed to me and put a ring on my finger.

Swahili - Translation: Alinichumbia na kunivalisha pete.

New Sentence: I am a huge fan of porridge mixed with milk.
Luganda - Translation: Njagala nnyo obuugi nga buteekeddwamu amata.

New Sentence: Your baby has a good appetite.

Swahili - Translation: Mtoto wako ana hamu nzuri ya kula.

New Sentence: His mother bought him a nice shirt, shorts, and sandals.
Luganda - Translation: Nnyina yamugulidde essaati, empale ne ssapatu ennungi.
Swahili - Translation: Mama yake alimnunulia shati zuri, kaptura, na viatu.

New Sentence: She bought her mother a large plot of land.

Swahili - Translation: Alimnunulia mama yake eneo kubwa la ardhi.

New Sentence: I am too tired to drive home.
Luganda - Translation: Nkooye nnyo okuvuga nzire ewaka.

New Sentence: Her face looks sad.

New Sentence: His phone fell off the table and got broken.
Luganda - Translation: Essimu ye yavudde ku mmeeza n'egwa era n'eyatika.
Swahili - Translation: Simu yake ilianguka mezani na kuvunjika.

New Sentence: Porridge is a good option for breakfast and dinner.

Swahili - Translation: Uji ni chaguo zuri kwaajili ya kifungua kinywa na chamcha.

New Sentence: We had a party to celebrate her graduation from high school.

New Sentence: I appreciate your help so much.

Swahili - Translation: Ninauthamini msaada wako sana.

New Sentence: He is a good musician.

New Sentence: His voice is really bad.

New Sentence: She is a brave lady.

New Sentence: Most farmers feel happy when it rains.
Luganda - Translation: Abalimu abasinga obungi bawulira essanyu ng'enkuba etonnye.
Swahili - Translation: Wakulima wengi hufurahi ikinyesha mvua.

New Sentence: I am feeling extremely bored.
Luganda - Translation: Mpulira mpuubadde nnyo.

New Sentence: My boyfriend slapped me in the face when we were arguing.

Swahili - Translation: Mpenzi wangu alinipiga kibao usoni tulipokuwa tunabishana.

New Sentence: He fell and broke her arm as she was riding the bicycle.

Swahili - Translation: Alianguka na kuvunjika mkono wake alipokuwa akiendesha baiskeli.

New Sentence: The driver dislikes driving behind those big trucks.

Swahili - Translation: Dereva huyo hapendi kuendesha nyuma ya malori hayo makubwa.

New Sentence: We hate that man because he has an evil heart.

Swahili - Translation: Hatumpendi mwanaume yule kwasababu ana roho mbaya.

New Sentence: The baby refused to suck the milk through a straw.

Swahili - Translation: Mtoto huyo alikataa kunyonya maziwa kupitia silaji.

New Sentence: She got angry when her sister said she is foolish.

Swahili - Translation: Alikasirika baada ya kumwambia ni mjinga.

New Sentence: I hate eating hard crisps.
Luganda - Translation: Saagala kulya crisps zibwatuka.

New Sentence: People dislike the kind of music you sing.
Luganda - Translation: Abantu tebaagala kika kya nnyimba z'oyimba.
Swahili - Translation: Watu hawapendi aina ya muziki uimbao.

New Sentence: She is unhappy because there is little improvement in her sick husband's health.
Luganda - Translation: Si musanyufu kubanga waliwo enkyukakyuka ntono mu bulamu bwa bba omulwadde.
Swahili - Translation: Hana furaha kwasababu kuna mabadiliko kidogo kwenye afya ya mumewe anayeumwa.

New Sentence: That boy is very dull in class.
Luganda - Translation: Omulenzi oyo mwebafu mu kibiina.
Swahili - Translation: Kijana huyo ni mvivu sana darasani.

New Sentence: I was unhappy when he rejected my calls yesterday.
Luganda - Translation: Saabadde musanyufu ng'aggyeeko essimu zange olunaku lw'eggulo.
Swahili - Translation: Sikufurahia alipokataa kupokea simu zangu jana.

New Sentence: We were angry when the nurses delayed giving our sick brother treatment.
Luganda - Translation: Twabadde banyiivu ng'omujjanjabi aluddewo okuwa nnyaffe omulwadde obujjanjabi.
Swahili - Translation: Tulikasirika baada ya wauguzi wale kuchelewa kumpatia matibabu kaka yetu aliye mgonjwa.

New Sentence: Sadly, she died on her graduation day.

Swahili - Translation: Huzuni, alifariki kwenye siku yake ya mahafali.

New Sentence: I hate this type of switch that the electrician bought.

Swahili - Translation: Sipendi aina hiki ya kiwashio alichokinunua yukle fundi umeme.

New Sentence: Our company director refused to travel for the business trip by car.

New Sentence: I got angry when my husband refused to go to work on Monday.

New Sentence: He got disappointed when we refused to eat the sweets he shared with us.

New Sentence: The tattoo he has on his upper back looks ugly.

Swahili - Translation: Bahati mbaya, mfanaya kazi za ndani niliyempata aliiva vito vyangu vyote.

Swahili - Translation: Walimu wangu hawaupendi mtindo wa ukataji nywele zangu.

Swahili - Translation: Sipendi aina ile ya kito kwasababu ni mtindo wa zamani sana.

Swahili - Translation: Tulifurahia mchezo ule wa mpira wa miguu tulioucheza jana.

New Sentence: I love the new home we bought.

New Sentence: The exam was very easy, I passed with flying colors.

New Sentence: She looks like an angel.

New Sentence: Some people develop an allergic reaction after getting a tattoo.

Swahili - Translation: Baadhi ya watu hupata matokeo ya mzio baada ya kuchora tatuu.

New Sentence: I hate working on Saturday.

Swahili - Translation: Sioendi kufanya kazi Jumamosi.

New Sentence: Her two-month-old firstborn child looks beautiful.

New Sentence: She refused to put on a sweater yet it was very cold.

New Sentence: He got angry when water poured on his grey suit.

New Sentence: I feel bad whenever you spend time watching cartoons.

New Sentence: People disliked the song she sang because it was abusive.

Luganda - Translation: Omukulu w'essomero yali munyiivu bwe bwerabira okubalirira ebitabo.

New Sentence: Our mother quarreled when we ate too much meat.

New Sentence: Africell's internet was so frustrating.

New Sentence: Today, MTN celebrates twenty years in business.

New Sentence: MTN has failed to handle some of the issues faced by its customers.

New Sentence: Airtel wireless internet speed is too slow in this area.

New Sentence: Airtel's internet is so good in some areas.

New Sentence: My Airtel internet has stopped working.

New Sentence: I have no money left on my Airtel mobile money account.

New Sentence: MTN has been delivering wonderful service in Uganda over the years.

New Sentence: MTN's internet connectivity in this area is worse.

Luganda - Translation: Omusirikale yawulidde obulumi bungi ng'okugulu kwe kukoseddwa gguluneedi.
Swahili - Translation: Mwanajeshi huyo alihisi mauivu makali baada ya mguu wake kuumizwa na gruneti.

New Sentence: The school director thanked the single fathers in her speech.
Luganda - Translation: Dayirekita w'essomero yeebazizza bataata abatalina bakyala mu kwogera kwe.
Swahili - Translation: Mkurugenzi wa shule hiyo aliwashukuru akina baba waishio pekeyao kwenye hotuba yake.

New Sentence: He enjoys stretching himself in the morning.
Luganda - Translation: Anyumirwa okwegolola ku makya.
Swahili - Translation: Anafurahia kujinyoosha yeye mwenyewe asubuhi.

New Sentence: I feel bad whenever I hear a baby crying.
Luganda - Translation: Mpulira bubi buli lwe mpulira omwana akaaba.
Swahili - Translation: Ninajisikia vibaya kila nisikiapo mtoto akilia.

New Sentence: We had a good time at the hotel after dinner.
Luganda - Translation: Twabadde n'akaseera akalungi ku wooteeri oluvannyuma lw'ekyeggulo.
Swahili - Translation: Tuliburudika kwenye hoteli hiyo baada ya chajio.

New Sentence: You are lucky to be born into a family with the best dentist.
Luganda - Translation: Olina omukisa okuzaalibwa mu famire erina omusawo w'amannyo asinga.
Swahili - Translation: Una bahati kuzaliwa kwenye familia yenye daktarimeno bora.

New Sentence: The receptionist is very responsive to the customer's needs.
Luganda - Translation: Ayaniriza abagenyi afayo nnyo ku byetaago bya bakasitoma.
Swahili - Translation: Mpokea wageni huyo ni msikivu sana kwa mahitaji ya wateja.

New Sentence: She was angry when I took her umbrella.
Luganda - Translation: Yabadde munyiivu nga ntutte manvuuli ye.
Swahili - Translation: Alikasirika nilipouchukua mwamvuli wake.

New Sentence: Sadly, he is late for the job interview.
Luganda - Translation: Eky'ennaku, ali kikeerezi ku kubuuzibw kw'omulimu.
Swahili - Translation: Inasikitisha, alichelewa kwenye usaili huo wa kazi.

New Sentence: Everyone likes your mother's lifestyle.
Luganda - Translation: Buli omu ayagala engeri nnyoko gy'atambuzaamu obulamu bwe.
Swahili - Translation: Kila mmoja anaupenda mtindo wa maisha wa mama yako.

New Sentence: The flowers which were planted outside the office look beautiful.
Luganda - Translation: Ebimuli ebyasimbibwa ebweru wa woofiisi birabika bulungi.
Swahili - Translation: Maua yaliyopandwa nje ya ofisi ile ni mazuri.

New Sentence: I feel happy whenever I read the messages you send in the morning.
Luganda - Translation: Mpulira essanyu buli lwe nsoma obubaka bw'oweereza ku makya.
Swahili - Translation: Ninajihisi furaha kila nisomapo ujumbe unitumiao asubuhi.

New Sentence: His parents got furious when he wasted a lot of money on drinking alcohol.
Luganda - Translation: Bazadde be beecwacwana be yayonoona ensimbi nnyingi mu kunywa omwenge.
Swahili - Translation: Wazazi wake walikasirika alipopoteza pesa nyingi kwenye ulevi.

New Sentence: He earned a lot of home from the ten acres of coffee that he had.
Luganda - Translation: Yafunamu nnyo mu yiika z'emmanyi kkumi ze yalina.
Swahili - Translation: Alijenga nyumba nyingi kutokana na ekari kumi za kahawa alizokuwa nazo.

New Sentence: The computer he bought at the auction is very durable.
Luganda - Translation: Kompyuta gye yaguze mu katale k'okuvuganya mpangaazi nnyo.
Swahili - Translation: Kompyuta aliyoinunua mnadani ni nzuri sana.

New Sentence: We got furious when they replied with fake answers.
Luganda - Translation: Twecwacwanye bwe bazzeemu ebyokuddamu ebifu.
Swahili - Translation: Tulikasirika walipojibu majibu batili.

New Sentence: The teacher was happy when the children finished their revisions on time.
Luganda - Translation: Omusomesa yabadde musanyufu ng'abaana bamalirizzaokusoma ebitabo mu budde.
Swahili - Translation: Mwalimu alifurahi baada ya watoto hao kumaliza marudio yao kwa wakati.

New Sentence: I love this golden ring.
Luganda - Translation: Njagala empeta eno eya zzaabu.
Swahili - Translation: Ninaipenda pete hii ya dhahabu.

New Sentence: He was happy when he heard that I work till morning.
Luganda - Translation: Yabadde musanyufu ng'awulidde nti nkola mpaka ku makya.
Swahili - Translation: Alifurahi aliposikia ninafanya kazi mpka asubuhi.

New Sentence: Half of the audience was sleeping because the play was boring.
Luganda - Translation: Ettundutundu ky'abalabi lyabadde lyebase kubanga omuzannyo gwabadde gubowa.
Swahili - Translation: Nusu ya hadhira ililala kwasababu muziki ulikuwa umepoa.

New Sentence: Everyone admires my unique skills in sewing mats.
Luganda - Translation: Buli omu yeegomba obukodyo bwange obw'enjawulo mu kuluka emikeeka.
Swahili - Translation: Kila mmoja huvutiwa kwa ujuzi wangu wa pekee kwenye kushona mkeka.

New Sentence: They were unhappy because their father said that what happened was his responsibility.
Luganda - Translation: Tebaabadde basanyufu kubanga kitaabwe yagambye nti y'avunaanyizibwa ku kyatuuseewo.
Swahili - Translation: Hawakuwa na furaha kwasababu baba yao alisema kwamba kilichotekea kilikuwa ni uwajibikaji wake.

New Sentence: It is exciting to hear that my son is joining the nursery school.
Luganda - Translation: Kisanyusa okuwulira nti mutabani wange agenda mu ssomero lya nnasale.
Swahili - Translation: Inafurahisha kusikia kwamba mtoto wangu wa kiume amejiunga na shule ya awali.

New Sentence: She is happy whenever her sponsors from Germany reply to her messages.
Luganda - Translation: Abeera musanyufu buli abavujjirizi be okuva e Bugirimaani lwe baanukula obubaka bwe.
Swahili - Translation: Amefurahi kila wafadhili wake kutoka Ujerumani wakijibu ujumbe wake.

New Sentence: We are pleased to receive our salary for the next month in advance.
Luganda - Translation: Tuli basanyufu okufuna omusaala gwaffe ogw'omwezi ogujja nga tetunnagukola.
Swahili - Translation: Tumefurahi kupokea msahara wetu kwaajili ya mwezi ujao mapema.

New Sentence: The manager was furious when his wife tore his academic documents after a fight.
Luganda - Translation: Maneja yeecwacwanye nga mukyala we ayuzizza ebiwandiiko bye eby'obuyigirize oluvanyuma lw'okulwanagana.
Swahili - Translation: Meneja huyo alikasirika baada ya mkewe kuchana nyaraka zake kitaaluma baada ya kugombana.

New Sentence: It strengthens me whenever I remember that God has good plans for us.
Luganda - Translation: Ki??umya buli lwe nzijukira nti Katonda alina enteekateeka ennungi gyetuli.
Swahili - Translation: Inaniimarisha kila nikumbukapo kwamba ana mipango mizuri kwaajili yetu.

New Sentence: We felt sorry for the young man because he was walking using crutches.
Luganda - Translation: Omuvubuka twamukwatidde ennaku kubanga yabadde atambulira ku miggo.
Swahili - Translation: Tulimuonea huruma kijana huyo kwasababu alikuwa akitembea kwa magongo.

New Sentence: I am rejoicing because tomorrow is my birthday.
Luganda - Translation: Njaganya kubanga nkya ge mazaalibwa gange.
Swahili - Translation: Nimefurahi kwasababu kesho ni kumbukizi yangu ya kuzaliwa.

New Sentence: The team leader is happy to get a market for the new products.
Luganda - Translation: Omukulu w'ekibinja musanyufu okufuna akatale ky'ebyamaguzi ebipya.
Swahili - Translation: Kiongozi wa timu hiyo amefurahi kupata soko kwaajili ya bidhaa zao mpya.

New Sentence: The children are happy to help their mother at the shop during holidays.

New Sentence: Customers enjoy the new payment system.
Luganda - Translation: Bakasitoma banyumirwa engeri empya ey'okusasulamu ensimbi.
Swahili - Translation: Wateja wanafurahia mfumo mpya wa ulipaji.

New Sentence: The villagers were tormented by the long spell of dry weather.
Luganda - Translation: Bannakyalo baakeeyerezebwa akasana akaamala ebbanga eggwanvu nga kaaka.
Swahili - Translation: Wanakijiji waliteseka kwa kipindi kirefu cha ukame.

New Sentence: She was unhappy when her husband kept on telling people about their personal life
Luganda - Translation: Teyali musanyufu ng'omwami we agenze mu maaso n'okunyumiza abantu ebikwata ku bulamu bwabwe.
Swahili - Translation: Hakufurahia baada ya mumewe kuendelea kuwaambia watu kuhusu maisha yao binafsi.

New Sentence: We were happy when the company helped us to advertise our goods.
Luganda - Translation: Twasanyuse ng kampuni etuyambyeko okulanga ebyamaguzi byaffe.

New Sentence: She was happy when they opened the dance school in their town.
Luganda - Translation: Yabadde musanyufu nga bagguddewo essomero ly'amazina mu kibuga kyabwe.
Swahili - Translation: Alifurahi walipofungua shule ya shule ya unenguaji kwenye mji wao.

New Sentence: He was disappointed and cried when his parents changed their minds about taking him abroad.
Luganda - Translation: Yabadde munyiivu era n'akaaba nga bazadde be bakyusizza ekirowoozo kyabwe eky'okumutwala ebweru w'eggwanga.
Swahili - Translation: Alisikitishwa na kulia baada ya wazazi wake kubadilisha mawazo yao ya kumpeleka nje ya nchi.

New Sentence: I am unhappy because my brother woke me up.
Luganda - Translation: Ndi musanyufu kubanga muganda wange/mwannyinaze yanzuukusizza.
Swahili - Translation: Sina furaha kwasababu kaka yangu aliniamsha.

New Sentence: They refused to wait for the bus.
Luganda - Translation: Baagaanye okulindirira bbaasi.

New Sentence: There are beautiful places to explore in this world.
Luganda - Translation: Bifo birungi okulambula mu nsi eno.

New Sentence: I fear people who move with knives.
Luganda - Translation: Ntya abantu abatambula n'obwambe.

New Sentence: We enjoy eating cookies for evening tea.
Luganda - Translation: Tunyumirwa okulya bubbiisikwiti ku caayi w'akawungeezi.

New Sentence: I was frustrated when the loan officer asked me a lot of difficult questions.

New Sentence: He hates traveling during the Christmas season.

New Sentence: The guests were unhappy when they found very few seats reserved for them.
Luganda - Translation: Abagenyi tebaabadde basanyufu bwe baasanze nga waliwo ebifo bitono nnyo ebibaterekeddwa.
Swahili - Translation: Wageni hao hawakufurahia walipokuta viti vichache vilivyotengwa kwaajili yao.

New Sentence: I hate interacting with lazy people.
Luganda - Translation: Saagala kunyumya na bantu bagayaavu.
Swahili - Translation: Sipendi kuchangamana na watu wavivu.

New Sentence: He feels comfortable living with his parents at home.

Swahili - Translation: Anajisikia amani kuishi pamoja ana wazazi wake nyumbani.

New Sentence: I enjoy chatting with my children in my free time.
Luganda - Translation: Nnyumirwa okunyumya n'abaana bange mu budde bwange obw'eddembe.
Swahili - Translation: Ninafurahia kupiga soga na watoto wangu watoto wangu niwapo na muda.

New Sentence: The children ran around the playground until they were exhausted.

Swahili - Translation: Watoto hao walikimbia uwanjani mpaka walipochoka.

New Sentence: The guard was confused when the crowd broke through the fence.
Luganda - Translation: Omukuumi yasobeddwa ng'abantu bayingidde mu kikomera.
Swahili - Translation: Mlinzi alichanganyikiwa baada ya kundi la watu walipouvunja uzio.

New Sentence: They were unhappy when they found out that she is a thief.

Swahili - Translation: Hawakufurahia walipokuta kwamba yeye ni mwizi.

New Sentence: She was happy when she got a house near the main road.
Luganda - Translation: Yabadde musanyufu ng'afunye ennyumba okumpi n'ekkubo eddene.
Swahili - Translation: Alifurahi alipopata nyumba karibu na barabara kuu.

New Sentence: I love baking cakes for Christmas.
Luganda - Translation: Njagala okufumba kkeeci za Ssekukkulu.
Swahili - Translation: Ninapenda kuoka keki kwaajili ya Krismasi.

New Sentence: I love the white duvet you bought.
Luganda - Translation: Njagala bulangiti enjeru gye waguze.

New Sentence: It is always a pleasure to see you.
Luganda - Translation: Kimpa essanyu buli lwe nkulaba.

New Sentence: She enjoys working in the evening.
Luganda - Translation: Anyumirwa okukola mu budde obw'akawungeezi.

New Sentence: I got angry when my daughter ate all the queen cakes without my knowledge.
Luganda - Translation: Nawulidde obusungu nga muwala wange alidde queen cakes zonna nga sikimanyi.
Swahili - Translation: Nilikasirika baada ya binti yangu kula keki zote za malkia bila ya mimi kufahamu.

New Sentence: She felt sad when she saw an old lame man in a wheelchair.
Luganda - Translation: Yawulidde ennaku bwe yalabye omusajja omukadde omulema mu kagaali k'abalema.

New Sentence: Today is a great day because we won the dance competition.
Luganda - Translation: Olwaleero lunaku lwa maanyi kubanga twawangudde empaka z'amazina.
Swahili - Translation: Leo ni siku kubwa kwasababu tulishinda mashindano ya unenguaji.

New Sentence: She was unhappy when her friend made bad comments about her parents
Luganda - Translation: Teyabadde musanyufu nga mukwano gwe ayogedde ebigambo ebibi ku bazadde be.
Swahili - Translation: Hakufurahi baada ya rafiki yake kutoa maoni mabaya kuhusu wazazi wake.

New Sentence: The young boy screamed helplessly when they got into an accident.
Luganda - Translation: Akalenzi akato kaalaajanye nga bagudde ku kabenje.
Swahili - Translation: Kijana huyo wa kiume slipigs kelele kiunyonge walipopata ajali.

New Sentence: I was happy when my workmates focused their attention on finishing the project.
Luganda - Translation: Nabadde musanyufu nga bakozi bannange essira balitadde ku kumaliriza pulojekiti.
Swahili - Translation: Nilifurahi baada ya wafanyakazi wenzangu kuelekeza fikira zao kwenye kwenye kumaliza kazi ile.

New Sentence: I feel rejected whenever people talk about me.
Luganda - Translation: Mpulira nga ndekeddwa bbali buli abantu lwe banjogerako.
Swahili - Translation: Ninajihisi kukataliwa kila watu waongeapo kuhusu mimi.

New Sentence: He hates putting on that brown long-sleeved shirt.
Luganda - Translation: Tayagala kwambala ssaati eyo eya kitaka ey'emikono emiwanvu.
Swahili - Translation: Hapendi kuvaa shati hilo la mikono mirefu.

New Sentence: I enjoy living a simple life.
Luganda - Translation: Nnyumirwa okubeera mu bulamu obumpa emirembe.
Swahili - Translation: Ninafurahia kuishi maisha mepesi.

New Sentence: That boy loves wearing blue jeans.
Luganda - Translation: Omulenzi oyo ayagala okwambala jjiini eza bbululu.
Swahili - Translation: Mvulana yule anapenda kuvaa jinzi la buluu.

New Sentence: Sadly, the old woman had a hip fracture when she fell.
Luganda - Translation: Eky'ennaku, omukyala omukadde yanuuse ekisambi ng'agudde.
Swahili - Translation: Inasikitisha, mwanamama huyo mzee alivunjika nyonga alipoanguka.

New Sentence: She loves putting on shorts when going to the beach.
Luganda - Translation: Ayagala okwambala ebinu ng'agenda ku bbiici.
Swahili - Translation: Anapenda kuvaa nguo fupi aendapo ufukweni.

New Sentence: My cousin refused to sit for her final examinations.
Luganda - Translation: Kizibwe wange yagaanye okutuula ebigezo bya eby'akamalirizo.
Swahili - Translation: Binamu yangu alikataa kufanya mitihani yake ya mwisho.

New Sentence: I was happy when we sat in silence and meditated on God's works.
Luganda - Translation: Nabadde musanyufu bwe twatudde ne tusiriikirira ne twefumintiriza ku mirimu gya Katonda.
Swahili - Translation: Nilifurahi tulipokaa kimya na kutafakari kazi za Mungu.

New Sentence: This is one of my favorite shopping malls.
